recipesJson.name: Pacha Mama (remix)
recipesJson.author: Mathematical
recipesJson.description:
will tweak this soon,  but its good as is, shared it on my Insta "mathematicall" and people seem to like it. 

based on the Charlies chalk dust PACHA MAMA profile (Fuji, Strawberry, Nectarine.) 
Remix- not a 1:1 clone.
Sweet Guava is the secret sauce here that ties it all together

reviews.text: This is fantastic! I don't care for fruit mixes much but mixed this for someone and it was perfect. Great for these hot days. Thank you for sharing this.
I love this juice. I been mixing with so much sweet guava and it really is the miracle of this mix. Never tried the original either but i don't think i need to.

Never tried the original but this remix sure is tasty. Like all the others said it is very smooth. I expected a little harshness only steeped it 3 days and with all fruits and citrusâ€™ & no creams to smooth them over I figured it would be a little sharp but i was pleasantly surprised excellent job very tasty recipe you created. I Need to remember to make another batch this summer and add some coolant

I'm piggy-backing off @HarvestMoon here, SNV is fucking phenomenal. Insanely smooth and lush. I literally said "holy shit" before I could even exhale my first puff of this stuff. Gotta give some credit to the folks who made the retail juice for designing an excellent profile, but for a DIY remix you hit this one out of the ballpark and then some @Mathematical. Stellar mix here, can't wait to see how it steeps, if it lasts that long :) Would love to see you do a mix with mostly the same components but with the nectarine. Bet it would be awesome if you could find the right nectarine concentrate to fit, but I trust your judgment after this one.
Shake and vape is very nice.. actually insanely smooth.. will have to make another batch let that one steep a bit and get back to you.
